articles.description: The streamer’s documentary goes beyond actresses like Felicity Huffman and Lori Loughlin, who bribed their children’s way into college, to focus on the corrupt system.
articles.content: The way the world works these days is unbelievable, cracked a private equity firm exec to college prep coach William Rick Singer during a wiretapped call. The men were hashing out a plan to Photoshop… [+9240 chars]
